#info

```{r}
#packages
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
library(matrixStats)
library(gridExtra)
library(ggpubr)
library(grid)
library(stringr)
library(plater)
library(raster)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#set working directory
setwd("S:/GlobalChangeEco/porewater_r scripts & Data/Data")

#read in plates

plate1 <- read_csv("S:/GlobalChangeEco/porewater_r scripts & Data/Data/Sulfide Microplate/COMPASS/2024 June/QAQC'd Data/COMPASS_H2S_20240705_plate1_Summary_Data.csv")
plate1 <- plate1[,c(2:8)]
plate2 <- read_csv("S:/GlobalChangeEco/porewater_r scripts & Data/Data/Sulfide Microplate/COMPASS/2024 June/QAQC'd Data/COMPASS_H2S_20240705_plate2_Summary_Data.csv")
plate2 <- plate2[,c(2:8)]
plate3 <- read_csv("S:/GlobalChangeEco/porewater_r scripts & Data/Data/Sulfide Microplate/COMPASS/2024 June/QAQC'd Data/COMPASS_H2S_20240705_plate3_Summary_Data.csv")
plate3 <- plate3[,c(2:8)]
plate3_2 <- read_csv("S:/GlobalChangeEco/porewater_r scripts & Data/Data/Sulfide Microplate/COMPASS/2024 June/QAQC'd Data/COMPASS_H2S_20240705_plate3_2_Summary_Data.csv")
plate3_2 <- plate3_2[,c(2:8)]


```
#combine plates 
```{r}
all_plate <- rbind(plate1, plate2, plate3, plate3_2)
head(all_plate)
```
```{r}
# export data
write.csv(all_plate, file="S:/GlobalChangeEco/Porewater_R scripts & Data/Data/Sulfide Microplate/COMPASS/2024 June/QAQC'd Data/COMPASS_H2S_202406_plate1-3_Summary_Data.csv")
```
